title: Spectral Algebraics: Audible Geometry via E8-Inspired Signal Synthesis & 3D Visualization
description: This release (v1.0.0) of Spectral Algebraics includes the E8 fractal power module, 20 audio presets, full 3D visualization engine, demo assets, and documentation. See https://github.com/QSOLKCB/SPECTRAL for details.
